findByEmailAddress

public RegistrationDTO findByEmailAddress(String emailAddress)
Finds an instance of Registration in the database by the Registration emailAddress, and copies the Registration properties to an instance of RegistrationDTO.

Specified by:
findByEmailAddress in interface RegistrationService
Parameters:
emailAddress - emailAddress of the Registration
Returns:
instance of RegistrationDTO, or null if a Registration cannot be found

hasEmailAddressBeenUsed

public boolean hasEmailAddressBeenUsed(String email)
Determines if an email address has already been used.

Specified by:
hasEmailAddressBeenUsed in interface RegistrationService
Parameters:
oldEmail - The previous email address, or null if this method is being called for a new email address.
newEmail - The email address that is being checked.
Returns:
true if newEmail is in use, false otherwise.
